attributes.action: Convicted Looters to do Community Service
attributes.additional_details:
All convicted Looters, specially the youngsters (under 18) who cannot be sent to jail, should be asked to do community services in the looted areas.

They should work with the community until its restored to its original condition and carry on working longer until the community decides to let them go.

We can't just only cut their benefits as this can lead to more violence and looting. Instead they need to be realised that they are part of this community and need to keep it safe and clean not just for themselves but also for future generations.
